apps.description3: We develop websites and mobile apps using some of the most modern technologies that exist, to be able to get user-friendly and fast webpages that are easy to handle for the user.

system.title: SYSTEM DEVELOPMENT
system.description: When you need a computer system that is custom made from the ground up to match your requirements - then we are the right agency for you.
system.description2: These systems can be something like internal administration systems, customer portals, web apps, mobile apps, CMS and much more.
system.description3: You have the possibility to fully customize and we make sure to deliver software that is completely dynamic to your requirements.

contactPage.description: Fill in the form and our team will respond to you within 24 hours.

aboutPage.title: WE ARE A TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS
aboutPage.description: Goat IT AB was founded 2022 because passion for code and to help our costumers in their digital journey. Goat IT is a international web agency with roots from both the north and south of Sweden, Örnsköldsvik and Ängelholm to be more exact.
aboutPage.description2: We enjoy collaborations with people from all over the world, for example we have get alot of help for the design of the page by Faisal Jutt from Pakistan, thank you Faisal!
aboutPage.description3: Our vision and goal is to create longterm, growing and beneficially relationships.

termsPage.title: Read our terms of purchase below!
termsPage.agreementDescription: The agreement runs indefinitely. The subscriber obtains the right to cancel the agreement at any time.
termsPage.subscriptionDescription: Subscription fee is invoiced monthly. All prices are excluding VAT. Reimbursement of the subscription fee does not take place during the current subscription period. Goat IT AB reserves the right to change the subscription fee for the upcoming contract period if the conditions have changed or for other reasons do not correspond to the previous year's subscription fee.
termsPage.paymentDescription: An invoice is automatically sent once (1) per month.
termsPage.deliveryDescription: Delivery takes place by Goat IT AB building the website for the Subscriber and sending individual login details to them. The website is launched at the Subscriber's request online! The password/Login applies only to the subscriber and may not be transferred.
termsPage.refundDescription: Reimbursement to the Consumer takes place within 30 days at the latest in the event that the Consumer cancels the purchase on valid grounds.
termsPage.rightOfWithdrawalDescription: According to ch. 2 § 4 § 1 p. The Distance and Home Sales Act (2005:59), the right of withdrawal does not apply to the concluded agreement when the Service is of such a nature that they are exempt from the scope of application of the law. By entering into the Agreement, the customer agrees that the right of withdrawal shall not apply.
termsPage.reclamationDescription: The consumer has the right to complain about the Service if its characteristics deviate from what was agreed upon or which follows from Swedish law. Goat IT AB follows the General Claims Board's prescribed recommendations. If the consumer wishes to use his right of complaint, contact Customer Service via e-mail, mandus@goatit.vip, with the necessary information such as contact details etc.
termsPage.maintenanceDescription: Goat IT AB reserves the right to maintain and thereby modify the content of the Service. Further development and updating of all Goat IT AB's Services takes place continuously.
termsPage.transferDescription: Subscriptions may not be transferred without written consent from Goat IT AB.
termsPage.suspensionDescription: Goat IT AB reserves the right to suspend a subscription with immediate effect and cancel the Agreement without repayment obligation if the Subscriber uses the Service in an inappropriate manner. Goat IT AB also has the right to suspend/temporarily pause a subscription and cancel the Agreement if the Subscriber does not pay an overdue invoice, applies for or is requested in liquidation or bankruptcy or otherwise can be assumed to be insolvent.
termsPage.minorsDescription: For sales to minors, we require the guardian's approval.
termsPage.personalDataDescription: Personal and company data are stored, encrypted and processed confidentially by Goat IT AB in accordance with the Personal Data Act (1998:204). Goat IT AB is the personal data controller for the processing and has the right to use this personal data to store the necessary customer information in order to complete the conclusion of the Agreement. Personal data that is stored is first name, last name, invoice address, e-mail address, social security number or organization number. Goat IT AB may disclose personal data to Svea Ekonomi AB and Bokio AB. The Registrant has the right to request a register extract in order to check what information is registered. The personal data controller is obliged, at the request of the data subject, to correct information that is incorrect, incomplete or misleading. The Registrant also has the right to have their data deleted on request. Goat IT AB has the right to sell data on to third parties. When ordering the Services, the customer gives his consent to the processing of personal data in accordance with the above.
termsPage.limitationLiabilityDescription: Goat IT AB is not responsible for how the subscriber uses or applies the ordered Service and also has no responsibility towards third parties for the subscriber's application or use. The content of the documents included in the Service are based on Swedish law as applied by Swedish law enforcement authorities at the latest at the time the subscriber gained access to them. Goat IT AB is not responsible for the accuracy of downloaded documents in the future. Any Goat IT AB that is included in the Services should be seen as an example and may require adaptation on a case-by-case basis. Goat IT AB is not responsible for alleged or incurred damage, loss or cost that is directly or indirectly due or allegedly due to the content of Goat IT AB's Services. Goat IT AB's Services should not be seen as legal, financial or any other form of advice. Goat IT AB is not responsible for any loss of data by the subscriber when using Goat IT AB's Services.
termsPage.intellectualproperty: Intellectual property rights and rights of use
termsPage.intellectualpropertyDescription: Goat IT AB owns all intellectual property rights including the entire website/hosting that the Subscriber provides.
termsPage.technicalDescription: Goat IT AB is not responsible for any shortcomings and limitations in the subscriber's operating system and computer environment. It is the Subscriber's responsibility to make sure that the Subscriber has the required technical standards for using the ordered Service before entering into the Agreement. Goat IT AB's Services assume that the Subscriber has the required technical standard.
termsPage.forceDescription: The parties are released from liability for breaches of the Agreement caused by circumstances beyond the party's control, such as disruptions or interruptions in public data or telecommunications networks, accidents, fire, lightning strikes, explosions, war, riots, floods, natural disasters, labor disputes (whether or not it involves parties staff or not) or changed authority regulation or authority intervention. In order for such a circumstance to be invoked as grounds for exemption, the party must notify the other party without delay. The party's obligations under the Agreement re-enter as soon as such circumstance as mentioned no longer exists.
termsPage.customerServiceDescription: Goat IT AB's customer service provides support 24/7. Support mainly refers to error reporting and technical problems with the services.
termsPage.otherDescription: In the event of conflict between the Agreement and the General Terms and Conditions, the provisions of the Agreement shall take precedence. Otherwise, reference is made to the applicable parts of IT companies' General regulations, Electronic services for public networks.
termsPage.applicableDescription: Agreements and general conditions shall be interpreted and applied according to Swedish substantive law. Disputes related to this shall finally be settled by the general court in the Stockholm district court as the first instance.
